attributes.action: Halt the proposed Reading one way IDR and carry out a full public enquiry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reading Borough Council has proposed and plan to implement alterations to the Inner Distribution Road in Reading which will make it a one way road. The council fails to see that the proposed road has many failings including safety concerns and the re-routing of traffic into neighbouring boroughs.  There is massive local objections to the plans which is being ignored by the Council. Please sign the petition to make the Council rethink.
